publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2293 Ian Jenkins: Closure of Glencorse Barracksâ€”That the Parliament notes with regret the decision of the Ministry of Defence to downgrade its only Scottish training centre to a selection centre resulting in the loss of around 100 jobs and calls on the Scottish Executive to consider what assistance it can offer Midlothian Council and local agencies in tackling the loss of a significant local employer in Penicuik and Midlothian.
S1M-2293 Closure of Glencorse Barracks (lodged on 3 October 2001) David Mundell*
S1M-2293 Closure of Glencorse Barracks (lodged on 3 October 2001) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2293 Closure of Glencorse Barracks (lodged on 3 October 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2293 Closure of Glencorse Barracks (lodged on 3 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2293 Closure of Glencorse Barracks (lodged on 3 October 2001) Alex Neil*
S1M-2293 Closure of Glencorse Barracks (lodged on 3 October 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2293 Closure of Glencorse Barracks (lodged on 3 October 2001) Shona Robison*
